name: Carrior
description:
Dodge incoming traffic – go against the tide of incoming drivers for as long as you can! Manoeuvre in the traffic – stay in the right places or move to the right spots – do whatever it takes to last the longest in Carrior!

Be sure to check the details of the game at http://gamti.com/carrior/ .

Carrior involves controlling a car while other cars are incoming – last the longest to get the high score!
